short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada seeking qualified consultants for geotechnical engineering services for the ASEC project.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada seeking proposals from qualified consultants to serve as ‘Geotechnical Engineer of Record’/‘Geotechnical Consultant’ and provide professional geotechnical engineering services during the Design Development and Design Package phases of the ASEC project, with the possibility of extending geotechnical engineering services to the construction phases of the project.
full_summary:
==================

### Atlantic Science Enterprise Centre (ASEC) Geotechnical Engineer of Record Services

**Tender Announcement** {#tender-announcement}
-------------------------

**Reference Number** {#reference-number}
:   WS4065178174-Doc4065586939

**Publication Date** {#publication-date}
:   2023-06-22

**Tender Closing Date** {#tender-closing-date}
:   2023-07-17T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Contract Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) seeks proposals from qualified consultants to serve as a Geotechnical Engineer of Record / Geotechnical Consultant for the Atlantic Science Enterprise Centre project in New Brunswick. The selected consultant will provide professional engineering services during the Design Development and Design Package phases. This contract may also include geotechnical engineering services for the construction phases.

### Key Information

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV (Specialized Public Building Construction Services)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Not Specified
*   **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St., Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Proposal Guidelines {#proposal-guidelines}

Please refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) document for detailed information on proposal submission and requirements.

### Contact Information {#contact-information}

For more information on this tender, please contact Carlos Castillo Nieto at [carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or  None. {#none}
